title: SOLD 2 Different SGC Graded Walter Johnsons
author: Northviewcats

posts.post_title: SOLD 2 Different SGC Graded Walter Johnsons
posts.post_content:
Hello Everyone,

I have these two graded T206 Walter Johnsons for sale. Priced as marked.

1910 Piedmont Cigarettes Walter Johnson Portrait SGC40 VG $1,600.00 delivered. SOLD

1911 Sweet Caporal Walter Johnson hands at Chest SGC20 Fair $650.00 delivered. SOLD

Payment: Paypal (Friends/family), check, or money order are all acceptable.

First response with a commitment to purchase gets the card.


Thanks for looking,

Joe
